name: Javascript
body: avaScript is the Programming Language for the Web.JavaScript can update and change both HTML and CSS.JavaScript can calculate, manipulate and validate data.

name: Python
body: Python is a popular programming language.It is used for:web development (server-side),software,development,mathematics,system scripting.

name: C
body: C is a general-purpose programming language.It is a very popular language, despite being old.C is strongly associated with UNIX, as it was developed to write the UNIX operating system.

name: TypeScript
body: TypeScript is a syntactic superset of JavaScript which adds static typing.This basically means that TypeScript adds syntax on top of JavaScript, allowing developers to add types.

name: Java
body: Java is a popular programming language.It is used for:Mobile applications (specially Android apps),Desktop applications,Web applications,Web servers and application servers,Games,Database connection,And much, much more

name: HTML
body: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language.HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages.HTML describes the structure of a Web page.HTML consists of a series of elements.HTML elements tell the browser how to display the content
